## IEventTarget.dispatchEvent() method

Synchronously invoke the affected event listeners with an event object

**Signature:**

```typescript
dispatchEvent(evt: T[keyof T], type?: string & keyof T): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  evt | T\[keyof T\] | The event object to be dispatch. |
|  type | string &amp; keyof T | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

void

false if the event was canceled, otherwise true
